body: The black dead eyes at the end creeped me out

For you guys in the comments that took the time to type your "this is not ntr" bullshit but dont have the time to actually type ntr definition in google to learn what the term means here it is:

Japanese acronym for Netorare, used to define a genre of adult manga or hentai, meaning "Cuckold". In short, the main(or not) character loved one(s) are taken or seduced away from him and the heroine might be willing or unwilling. This is to cause an emotion of deep jealousy on the reader.In some ntr the cheated on individual may in up in a situation where they are forced to watch there significant other cheat on them. To go slightly further. Some ntr is known as NETORI. This can also be defined as Cheating. BTW ITS NOT GENDER SPECIFIC so a husband cheating also counts
just do it with your mother idiot.. why did you trade with your wife lol.. its a waste..

@whateverthefuckthosetranslateto it's probably sensitive people who think any type of betrayal in a relationship, that leads to (at the very least) one of the pair "falling", is horrendous, and try to warn others of this before reading. But yeah this is def not NTR, really hot af, and is especially hot with the mama getting plowed as well.
